name: chordsheetjs

description: A JavaScript library for parsing and formatting chord sheets

scripts.build:template: handlebars "src/formatter/templates/$TEMPLATE.handlebars" -f "src/formatter/templates/$TEMPLATE.js" --known each --known if --known with --known paragraphClasses --known isChordLyricsPair --known isTag --known isComment --known shouldRenderLine --known hasChordContents --known lineHasContents --known lineClasses --known toUpperCase --known paragraphClasses --commonjs handlebars
